"Smart Museum.

"
"Smart Museum is the app that allows you to turn a simple visit to a museum into a new and " "more engaging experience.

" "Thanks to the QR-Code that is close to the work you are interested in, you will be able to" "read or listen to the information about it directly on your smartphone.
" "Just press the scan button, point the camera toward the QR-Code and the game is done.

" "Once the information on the work has appeared, you can:

" "- listen to the description by pressing the button with the symbol of the loudspeaker.

" "- scroll through the gallery with photos of the work.

" "- watch any videos that affect you by pressing the button with the camera symbol.


" "Good fun!


"
"For more information, visit the site:" smartmuseum.000webhostapp.com "



"
This app allows you to visit a museum in a simple and interactive way
You have the ability to decide whether to read or listen to information about the works
Place a barcode in the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
